name: part_013
file: tmp_[3D LIVE] Climax Story Live - Ending Summer w⧸ Swimsuits & Yukata! (35 holoJP members) #皆で観ようホロサマライブ [zQuFRSi5ebc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru, Nakiri Ayame, Hoshimachi Suisei, and Ookami Mio perform 'Sparklers' in their yukata outfits on a stage decorated with lanterns.

Houshou Marine attempts to sneakily gather the 'Shiny Smily Crystals' from the stage after the performance, but she is caught by Shirakami Fubuki. Marine falls, causing the crystals to glow and trigger a transition to the finale.
The grand finale performance of 'Our Bright Parade' begins, featuring various hololive members across multiple stages and settings.

subtitles.original: 新しい浴衣着替えて
subtitles.english: Changing into a new yukata

subtitles.original: 「どうかな？」って見せ合ったり
subtitles.english: Showing each other and asking "How do I look?"

subtitles.original: 気温のせいにしちゃって
subtitles.english: Blaming it on the temperature

subtitles.original: 熱い気持ちで未来を語ったり
subtitles.english: Talking about the future with passion

subtitles.original: どんなことでも　冒険みたいになる
subtitles.english: Anything can become an adventure

subtitles.original: 期待値が上がってしまうシーズン
subtitles.english: The season when expectations rise

subtitles.original: 当たり前の日も　特別だってこと
subtitles.english: That even ordinary days are special

subtitles.original: この瞬間　この一瞬だって
subtitles.english: That even this moment, this very instant

subtitles.original: 思わせる
subtitles.english: Makes us feel that way

subtitles.original: 賑わう人で混み合うほど
subtitles.english: The more crowded it gets with people

subtitles.original: なぜだか楽しい気分だね
subtitles.english: The more fun it feels for some reason

subtitles.original: 映画の窓のような屋台
subtitles.english: Stalls like windows in a movie

subtitles.original: ひとつひとつ覗いて
subtitles.english: Looking into each and every one

subtitles.original: 一緒に　一緒に　歩こう
subtitles.english: Let's walk together, together

subtitles.original: 振り返っても
subtitles.english: Even if I look back

subtitles.original: ほんのちょっとも
subtitles.english: Not even a little bit

subtitles.original: トリミング出来ないようなシーンばっかり
subtitles.english: There are only scenes that can't be trimmed

subtitles.original: 過ぎ去ってしまう前にもう一度だけ
subtitles.english: Just once more before it passes by

subtitles.original: みんなといたい
subtitles.english: I want to be with everyone

subtitles.original: 想い出たちを彩るように
subtitles.english: To color our memories

subtitles.original: 夜空に咲いた花火が
subtitles.english: The fireworks blooming in the night sky

subtitles.original: 色鮮やかに輝いてた
subtitles.english: Were shining vividly

subtitles.original: ずっと…一緒にいたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to be with you... forever

subtitles.original: 来年もまたこんな風に
subtitles.english: Next year, in this same way again

subtitles.original: 笑い合いたいって思うから
subtitles.english: Because I want us to laugh together

subtitles.original: 線香花火に願うんだ
subtitles.english: I make a wish on a sparkler

subtitles.original: 「ずっとずっと続いて」
subtitles.english: "Let it last forever and ever"

subtitles.original: きっと　きっと
subtitles.english: Surely, surely

subtitles.original: 叶う
subtitles.english: It will come true

subtitles.original: お、ライブ無事終わった？
subtitles.english: Oh, is the live over safely?

subtitles.original: よしよし、今のうちにクリスタルをっと…
subtitles.english: Good, good, while I can, I'll take the crystals...

subtitles.original: あっはっは。これで来年のサマーも…
subtitles.english: Ahahaha. With this, next year's Summer will also...

subtitles.original: あれ、マリンさん。もうライブは終わりましたよ。
subtitles.english: Oh, Marine-san. The live is already over, you know.

subtitles.original: えっ！？
subtitles.english: What!?

subtitles.original: あ、これ、その…
subtitles.english: Ah, this is, well...

subtitles.original: あぁ〜〜！
subtitles.english: Aaa~~!

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to see the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にした
subtitles.english: I held that dream in my hands

subtitles.original: それぞれ誓った　ここで
subtitles.english: Each of us made a vow, right here

subtitles.original: 走り出そう
subtitles.english: Let's start running

subtitles.original: どこ見ても真っ暗な場所に芽生えてた
subtitles.english: It had sprouted in a place that was pitch black no matter where I looked

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな希望にこの瞳奪われた
subtitles.english: My eyes were captivated by just a tiny bit of hope

subtitles.original: 不安で揺れる心をうまくチューニングして
subtitles.english: Tuning my heart that's swaying with anxiety

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな勇気を振り絞っていたよ
subtitles.english: I was squeezing out just a tiny bit of courage

subtitles.original: 諦めの文字でリミットして進む
subtitles.english: Moving forward by limiting myself with the word "giving up"

subtitles.original: 苦しい時も
subtitles.english: Even during painful times

subtitles.original: もう私は
subtitles.english: I am no longer

subtitles.original: 独りじゃないから
subtitles.english: alone anymore

subtitles.original: だからもっと夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: So I want to chase my dreams even more

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: This excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 騒ごう
subtitles.english: Let's make some noise
